title:
A family of orthogonal functions on the unit circle and a new
  multilateral matrix inverse
abstract:
Using Bailey's very-well-poised $_6\psi_6$ summation, we show that a specific
sequence of well-poised bilateral basic hypergeometric $_3\psi_3$ series form a
family of orthogonal functions on the unit circle. We further extract a
bilateral matrix inverse from Dougall's ${}_2H_2$ summation which we use, in
combination with the Pfaff--Saalsch\"utz summation, to derive a summation for a
particular bilateral hypergeometric $_3H_3$ series. We finally provide
multivariate extensions of the bilateral matrix inverse and the $_3H_3$
summation in the setting of hypergeometric series associated to the root system
$A_r$.
